explains: adj. （头痛）欲裂的；极快的；滑稽的
v. 裂开；（人群）分成多组；（非正式）头剧痛（split 的现在分词）
wordGroup: splitting machine 劈木机；分切机；片皮机

sentences.en: Any thought of splitting up the company was unthinkable, they said.
sentences.cn: 他们说，任何分裂该公司的想法都是不可思议的。

sentences.en: Tree roots force their way into cracks in rocks and, in so doing, speed their splitting.
sentences.cn: 树根强行钻入岩石的裂缝，并以此加快了岩石的分裂。

sentences.en: I'm sad that Julie's marriage is on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.cn: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。
